**2020-03-11 / @rsc, @griesemer, @ianlancetaylor, @bradfitz**

[_**These are a week late.
The meeting happened last Wednesday,
but world events intervened and I forgot to post them.
We're skipping this week and picking up next week.
Sorry!**_]

  - commented

  - commented

  - commented

  - discussion ongoing

  - discussion ongoing

  - **likely accept**; last call for comments ‚è≥
